Text.val: 13.01.2014 GB SCR18587 Added additional test which check if is there row in DUNH
11.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (DUNH)
12.03.2012 GB SCR17173 Updated the DUNH_METHOD, DUNH_RECIPIENT_TEXT, DUNH_DESCRIPTION
03.11.2009 AK SCR15032 no 'invoice not found' error in case of empty invo column
15.06.2009 GB SCR14684 Changed condition for call the BXA031
17.04.2009 GB SCR14558 Changed condition for the case when DUNH row is store
-- if no row exists in DEBC
-- if no row exists in INVO (and invoce number supplied in CSV)

ExpSyntax.val: IF (Trim ({0,6})='',MlsTrans ('new detail concerning debtor')&' "'&Trim (Str ({0,7},'5'))&'" '&Trim ({0,9}),MlsTrans ('new detail concerning invoice')&' "'&Trim ({0,6})&'" "'&Trim (Str ({0,7},'5'))&'" '&Trim ({0,9}))

Text.val: ... only if all T203 rows were handeld
and there are still T203 rows present where T203_RUNNUMBER = PI.RUNNUMBER
